9namespace DeckLink {
10
11 VideoInputFrame::VideoInputFrame(IDeckLinkVideoInputFrame *raw_input_frame)
12 : VideoFrame(static_cast<IDeckLinkVideoFrame*>(raw_input_frame))
13 , _raw_input_frame(raw_input_frame)
14 {
15 // Ensure that the frame will remain alive for as long as this class does
16 _raw_input_frame->AddRef();
17 }
18
19
20 VideoInputFrame::~VideoInputFrame() {
21 _raw_input_frame->Release();
22 }
23
24
25 double VideoInputFrame::stream_time() const {
26 BMDTimeValue frame_time, frame_duration;
27 BMDTimeScale time_scale = 24000;
28 const HRESULT result = _raw_input_frame->GetStreamTime(
29 &frame_time, &frame_duration, time_scale);
30
31 if (result != S_OK) {
32 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
33 << errmsg("Unknown Error")
34 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkVideoInputFrame::GetStreamTime")
35 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
36 );
37 }
38
39 return static_cast<double>(frame_time) / static_cast<double>(time_scale);
40 }
41
42
43 double VideoInputFrame::hardware_reference_timestamp() const {
44 BMDTimeValue frame_time, frame_duration;
45 BMDTimeScale time_scale = 24000;
46 const HRESULT result = _raw_input_frame->GetHardwareReferenceTimestamp(
47 time_scale, &frame_time, &frame_duration);
48
49 if (result != S_OK) {
50 BOOST_THROW_EXCEPTION(decklink_driver_error()
51 << errmsg("Unknown Error")
52 << decklink_command("IDeckLinkVideoInputFrame::GetStreamTime")
53 << decklink_error_code(static_cast<HResult>(result))
54 );
55 }
56
57 return static_cast<double>(frame_time) / static_cast<double>(time_scale);
58 }
59
60
61 size_t row_bytes(PixelFormat pixel_format, int width) {
62 switch(pixel_format) {
63 case PixelFormat::YUV_8Bit:
64 return static_cast<size_t>( width * 2 );
65
66 case PixelFormat::YUV_10Bit:
67 return static_cast<size_t>( (width + 47) / 48 * 128 );
68
69 case PixelFormat::ARGB_8Bit:
70 case PixelFormat::BGRA_8Bit:
71 return static_cast<size_t>( width * 4 );
72
73 case PixelFormat::RGB_12Bit:
74 case PixelFormat::RGBLE_12Bit:
75 return static_cast<size_t>( (width * 36) / 8 );
76
77 case PixelFormat::RGB_10Bit:
78 case PixelFormat::RGBXLE_10Bit:
79 case PixelFormat::RGBX_10Bit:
80 return static_cast<size_t>( (width + 63) / 64 * 256 );
81
82 // For the remaining pixel formats the number of bytes per row can not be computed ahead of time
83 default:
84 return 0;
85 }
86 }
87}
